argument.name: Data_Value
argument.description: Character data to be saved in the dictionary.

page.description: Remove all keys from the string dictionary.
page.discussion: The .CLEAR() method Removes all keys from a StringDictionary list.
page.example: dim sd as StringDictionary sd.set("abc", "3") ? sd.get("abc") = "3" sd.clear() ? sd.get("abc") = ""
